a490c077.title: Clark
a490c077.description: This is the unbelievable story of Clark Olofsson, the controversial criminal who inspired the term "Stockholm syndrome." Based on his truths and lies.

89c0510b.title: Blackfish
89c0510b.description: They're hunted, herded and forced to dance. Meet a 15,000-pound slave -- on the edge of a psychotic break.

34e62ba3.title: Jimmy Savile: A British Horror Story
34e62ba3.description: This 2022 documentary series set in the UK features DJ and broadcaster Jimmy Savile in archival footage.

cf4cf441.title: Hold Tight
cf4cf441.description: When a young man goes missing soon after his friend dies, life in a tight-knit, affluent Warsaw suburb slowly unravels, exposing secrets and lies. This engrossing thriller series is based on the Harlan Coben novel of the same name.

e0ada28a.title: Archive 81
e0ada28a.description: An archivist takes a job restoring damaged videotapes and gets pulled into the vortex of a mystery involving the missing director and a demonic cult.

7023c002.title: 13 Commandments
7023c002.description: Thou shalt not kill. But thou can mete out poetic justice with maximum cruelty -- if thou is a vicious serial attacker.

a76eb312.title: Ouija
a76eb312.description: When their friend mysteriously dies, grieving teens seek connection via an antique ouija board that conjures up a nightmare from the other side.

f871de48.title: Brokeback Mountain
f871de48.description: Their love was forbidden. Their passion was real. Their torment took them through a lifetime of joy and bitterness.

84d64524.title: Stranger Things
84d64524.description: This eerie homage to '80s classics boasts a "Spielbergian sense of wonder and a John Hughes-like knack for underage anthropology" (The New Yorker).

d03230c6.title: The Stranger
d03230c6.description: A stranger approaches Adam Price with a disturbing allegation about his wife, Corinne. Meanwhile, detectives Johanna and Wes take on a bizarre case.

7b3465ba.title: Scream
7b3465ba.description: Memories of a town's dark past are stirred when a group of teens become suspects, targets and victims of a killer who’s out for blood.

510ab3c5.title: The Valhalla Murders
510ab3c5.description: An Oslo detective with a painful past returns to his native Iceland to help a dedicated cop hunt a serial killer with a link to a mysterious photo.
510ab3c5.chinese: 瓦爾哈拉連續殺人事件

78331f6b.title: The Woods
78331f6b.description: In 1994, a summer camp reels from a brutal crime. Twenty-five years later, the police seek prosecutor Paweł Kopiński's help identifying a murder victim.

d2cc2014.title: The Haunting of Bly Manor
d2cc2014.description: Dead doesn't mean gone. An au pair plunges into an abyss of chilling secrets in this gothic romance from the creator of "The Haunting of Hill House."

3f9aa094.title: You
3f9aa094.description: After learning a bitter truth, a chef joins his best friend and restaurant partner in a culinary competition in Cancún to reignite his zest for life.

28d3b07a.title: Elite
28d3b07a.description: Another school year, another intriguing mystery. At Las Encinas, it's not about what grade you get, but what crime you solve.

b4c05917.title: Ratched
b4c05917.description: Nurse Mildred Ratched seeks employment at Lucia State Hospital as it prepares to admit a new psychiatric patient: notorious killer Edmund Tolleson.

640f8025.title: How to Get Away With Murder
640f8025.description: A law professor gives her students a shot at some real-world cases. Too bad that includes embroiling them in murder.

df63e7ff.title: Life After Death with Tyler Henry
df63e7ff.description: With 300,000 people on his waiting list, medium Tyler Henry shares his famed gift around the US while uncovering family secrets in this docuseries.
df63e7ff.chinese: 靈媒泰勒·亨利：死後人生

1f8e0bb0.title: Requiem
1f8e0bb0.description: Why do black mirrors and a little girl's face terrify her? The voices in the woods might know the answer.

e3076224.title: Tabula Rasa
e3076224.description: Mie, who has amnesia, finds herself in a locked psych ward, where a detective questions her about the recent disappearance of a man she was seen with.

e7912e03.title: Light the Night
e7912e03.description: This 2021 drama thriller series features Ruby Lin, Tony Yang and Cheryl Yang.

694d1c0e.title: Black Mirror
694d1c0e.description: The sleek world of tomorrow offers opportunities beyond our wildest dreams. At a price out of our worst nightmares.

5e2ca520.title: Behind Her Eyes
5e2ca520.description: A spilled drink at a bar leads to an awkward day at work for Louise, who's shaken again by night terrors. David introduces Adele to his new colleagues.
5e2ca520.chinese: 三人要守密，兩人得死去

a8bc6712.title: The Ripper
a8bc6712.description: In the 1970s, the brutal murders of sex workers in economically depressed areas of the UK spark little public interest — until a teen is also killed.

acfbfaac.title: Reset
acfbfaac.description: A deadly bus crash leaves a college student and a games designer in a time loop. Based on a novel.

153df806.title: Making a Murderer
153df806.description: Filmed for over a decade, this gripping story of crime, corruption and murder won four Emmys, including Outstanding Documentary or Nonfiction Series.

834af1f2.title: Seven
834af1f2.description: When good and evil collide, it will take a special warrior to intervene. And he'll need to hone his exorcism skills.

1219084c.title: Tiger King
1219084c.description: Watched by more than 34 million in the US in its first 10 days of release, this stranger-than-fiction documentary was a pop culture sensation in 2020.

22fb0f10.title: Money Heist
22fb0f10.description: This critically acclaimed series, praised by Film Daily as "the most addictive show on TV," won Best Drama at the International Emmys and the Premios Fénix.

5f25cda3.title: Dirty John
5f25cda3.description: When love becomes twisted, and trust turns into manipulation, anything can happen — including murder — in this true-crime anthology series.

5840aaf1.title: Mr. Hiiragi’s Homeroom
5840aaf1.description: Days before graduation, an unassuming teacher takes his class hostage: he's determined to confront the truth about their classmate who died by suicide.
5840aaf1.chinese: 3 年 A 班：從此刻起，大家都是我的人質

88fb0b5d.title: Haunted
88fb0b5d.description: Real people. Real stories. Really scary. The things they've seen are horrible ... and continue to haunt them.

d8de37db.title: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer
d8de37db.description: A series of murders, rapes and kidnappings baffles police until detectives Gil Carrillo and Frank Salerno team up and start connecting the crimes.

1ca4288a.title: The End of the F***ing World
1ca4288a.description: This comedy-drama series based on the graphic novel by Charles Forsman features Alex Lawther and Jessica Barden.
1ca4288a.chinese: 去 X 的世界末日

1ee206b8.title: After Life
1ee206b8.description: This darkly comedic drama series about a widower struggling with the meaning of life was created by and stars Ricky Gervais.

e5ac0ea2.title: The Victims' Game
e5ac0ea2.description: A man is torn between justice and fatherly love. And he must find the perpetrators before they become the next victims.

d9cbd1b9.title: Orphan
d9cbd1b9.description: Kate and John Coleman adopt 9-year-old Esther from an orphanage, but it doesn't take long for Kate to see through Esther's angelic façade.

3f1fe4e5.title: Gone for Good
3f1fe4e5.description: When his girlfriend suddenly disappears, a man races to unravel a maddening web of clues — and begins to uncover long-buried secrets from his own past.

2a17b7d2.title: Gone Girl
2a17b7d2.description: His marriage crumbling, Nick comes home one day to find his wife has vanished. And as the police turn up the heat, shocking truths come to light.

f2c42ee0.title: Into the Night
f2c42ee0.description: This apocalyptic sci-fi thriller series features Pauline Etienne and Laurent Capelluto.

de1cd649.title: F is for Family
de1cd649.description: Bill Burr channels his 1970s childhood and his flair for comic rants into a raucous family sitcom co-starring Laura Dern, Justin Long and Sam Rockwell.

9ea88656.title: Perfume
9ea88656.description: When another victim turns up, the police zero in on a suspect. Nadja's lingering doubts -- and a tip from Köhler -- lead to a shocking confrontation.

e6a58441.title: Parasite
e6a58441.description: A family of have-nots latch onto a chance to thrive off a family of haves. But in truth, leeching goes both ways.

deaab5da.title: The Exorcist
deaab5da.description: Is a little girl still just a little girl if a demon lurks inside her? Two priests pray the answer is "yes."

84d67fa3.title: Locke & Key
84d67fa3.description: While Nina uncovers details about Rendell's past, Kinsey helps out the Savini Squad, Tyler falls in with a bad crowd, and Bode finds another key.

b07091de.title: The Game
b07091de.description: An aloof investment banker's life spirals into peril and paranoia after his brother gives him an odd birthday gift: the chance to play a mysterious game.

13ec9d2a.title: Exhibit A
13ec9d2a.description: This true crime series shows how innocent people have been convicted with dubious forensic techniques and tools such as touch DNA and cadaver dogs.
13ec9d2a.chinese: 鑑識科學：真科學或假證據？

bf3b7fde.title: The Queen's Gambit
bf3b7fde.description: Sent to an orphanage at age 9, Beth develops an uncanny knack for chess — and a growing dependence on the green tranquilizers given to the children.

f07433d8.title: Riverdale
f07433d8.description: A campy teen melodrama with biting humor, this modern-day take on the characters of Archie Comics is "an enjoyable and moody teen series,” says Slate.

7e2d47f6.title: A Brighter Summer Day
7e2d47f6.description: In 1960s Taiwan, a teenage boy and the girl he loves confront gang violence, cultural upheaval and their own mutable sense of identity.

39e4e1b2.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
39e4e1b2.description: When psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to help a teen contact her deceased mother, she unwittingly unleashes a demon that torments the girl.
39e4e1b2.chinese: 陰兒房第 3 章：從靈開始

a3079261.title: The Women and the Murderer
a3079261.description: This documentary traces the capture of serial killer Guy Georges through the tireless work of two women: a police chief and a victim's mother.
a3079261.chinese: 緝兇英雌：巴黎連環殺人事件

56fa3c91.title: Collateral
56fa3c91.description: A hunt in L.A. begins when a cabbie picks up a deadly passenger. You won't want to be on their list of stops.

e93aea82.title: House of Wax
e93aea82.description: A group of friends making their way to a college football game fall prey to two bloodthirsty brothers in an abandoned small town.

c16e2d34.title: The Spy
c16e2d34.description: In the 1960s, Israeli clerk-turned-secret agent Eli Cohen goes deep undercover inside Syria on a perilous, years-long mission to spy for Mossad.

47e562a5.title: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
47e562a5.description: On her way to meet his parents, something isn't right. Not with her boyfriend, or his family, or her own fragmenting reality.

7fd6f4e8.title: Fight Club
7fd6f4e8.description: Dissatisfied with life? Try something different -- and a bit brutal. Just never forget the first rule of Fight Club ...

59a2b0a6.title: The Bridge Curse
59a2b0a6.description: A group of university students decides to test an urban legend about the ghost of a female student that haunts a campus bridge.

cd12841d.title: The Fearless
cd12841d.description: A reborn triad man with an ability to see the dead teams up with a forensic expert to solve mysterious crimes.

04e7b814.title: Formosa 1867
04e7b814.description: This series reconstructs the history of the fatal Rover Incident in 1867 when the U.S. sent a military expedition to investigate a shipwreck in Taiwan.

7e4b0bfb.title: Close Your Eyes Before It’s Dark
7e4b0bfb.description: While vacationing at a mountain cabin, a group of longtime friends uncovers an old scandal that could have deadly consequences.

6fa9ad21.title: Inside the World’s Toughest Prisons
6fa9ad21.description: These prisons are quagmires of violence and misery. Two fearless journalists dare to go behind bars anyway.
6fa9ad21.chinese: 深入全球最難熬的監獄

9c96c3be.title: American Murder: The Family Next Door
9c96c3be.description: Using raw, firsthand footage, this documentary examines the disappearance of Shanann Watts and her children, and the terrible events that followed.
9c96c3be.chinese: 美國殺人檔案：鄰家好爸爸

b05809fe.title: The Invisible Guest
b05809fe.description: After waking next to his now-dead lover in a hotel room, a young businessman hires a prominent lawyer to figure out how he ended up a murder suspect.

a795e5f0.title: Tell Me Who I Am
a795e5f0.description: After a twin loses his memory, his brother gifts him with an idyllic childhood. But the truth can’t be hidden forever.

1e69d327.title: Osmosis
1e69d327.description: In near-future Paris, two brilliant siblings unveil a high-tech implant designed to pair up soul mates. But the beta test yields unwelcome surprises.

60543567.title: Evil Genius: the True Story of America's Most Diabolical Bank Heist
60543567.description: A bank robbery in Pennsylvania ends in the bombing death of a pizza deliveryman who may or may not have been a hostage forced to commit the crime.

6e5569a8.title: It's Kind of a Funny Story
6e5569a8.description: A teenager in crisis checks into a psych ward but does he belong there? A bearded stranger may have all the answers.

4770c38d.title: Fear Street Part 1: 1994
4770c38d.description: Chat rooms, mix tapes, murders at the mall. A killer '90s soundtrack fuels this throwback horror flick packed with slasher kills and jump-scare thrills.

2a4593c1.title: Dead Silence
2a4593c1.description: In the face of terror, staying quiet is nearly impossible. But if she hears you ... you'll never say another word.

cd20709d.title: This Is Pop
cd20709d.description: Uncover the real stories behind your favorite pop songs as this docuseries charts the impact of the festival scene, Auto-Tune, boy bands and more.

0ad842dc.title: Gold Leaf
0ad842dc.description: In 1949, the only daughter of Taiwan's largest tea exporter decides take charge of the indebted business rather than handing everything over to a man.

f07b66ed.title: The Tag-Along: The Devil Fish
f07b66ed.description: Two students team up with a medium after accidentally catching a demon fish and releasing evil spirits into the world. Based on a Taiwanese urban legend.
f07b66ed.chinese: 人面魚: 紅衣小女孩外傳

ecb5ee4a.title: Annabelle Comes Home
ecb5ee4a.description: A devilish doll presides over a haunted house of horrors, awakening evil spirits in the home of two demonologists and terrorizing their young daughter.

b7d406f6.title: Totally Spies!
b7d406f6.description: These clever girls aren't just shopaholic teens. After school, they're agents for a secret organization where villains run amok and cool gadgets rule!

5dc81f93.title: Memento
5dc81f93.description: Suffering short-term memory loss after a head injury, Leonard Shelby embarks on a grim quest to find the lowlife who murdered his wife.

efc8af7d.title: Oats Studios
efc8af7d.description: Director Neill Blomkamp produces a series of experimental short films that envision post-apocalyptic worlds and nightmarish scenarios.

1c94a0eb.title: Hollywood
1c94a0eb.description: While waiting for his big break, aspiring movie star Jack Castello accepts a job at a local service station that pumps more than just gas.

b4a45bbe.title: Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich
b4a45bbe.description: Survivors recount how Epstein abused, manipulated and silenced them as he ran a so-called molestation "pyramid scheme" out of his Palm Beach mansion.
b4a45bbe.chinese: 傑佛瑞·艾普斯坦：上流濁水

e71bb45f.title: Panic Room
e71bb45f.description: A woman and her daughter are caught in a game of cat-and-mouse with burglars in their New York City home and are forced to retreat inside a vault.

56b04aed.title: Biohackers
56b04aed.description: A gifted medical student searching for answers. A pioneering doctor playing God. Experimenting with the truth can be deadly.

aff03a08.title: Red Notice
aff03a08.description: An FBI profiler pursuing the world's most wanted art thief becomes his reluctant partner in crime to catch an elusive crook who's always one step ahead.

2c1a7114.title: The Power of the Dog
2c1a7114.description: Filmmaker Jane Campion's "exquisitely crafted" drama starring Benedict Cumberbatch is "driven by transfixing performances," raves The Hollywood Reporter.

6690775f.title: Making Fun
6690775f.description: Grumpy expert maker Jimmy DiResta fields kids' ideas for delightfully pointless inventions. Then — if he's in the mood — he and his pals build 'em.

24709b09.title: The Falls
24709b09.description: After having to quarantine together during COVID-19, a mother and daughter are forced to confront their personal obstacles and relationship tensions.

0f2786e9.title: Canine Intervention
0f2786e9.description: No dog, no breed, no behavior is unfixable for Cali K9's Jas Leverette. Follow the Oakland dog trainer as he works with a range of canines and owners.

c24eda0a.title: I AM A KILLER: RELEASED
c24eda0a.description: In this crime docuseries spinoff, a convict is paroled 30 years after being sentenced to death for murder. Then he makes a stunning confession.

4e0d7c6a.title: The Midnight Gospel
4e0d7c6a.description: His curiosity's as cosmic as the mind. And it's fed by a wild universe, home to intelligent beings who have stories to share.

475e7539.title: The Privilege
475e7539.description: After stumbling upon a bizarre ritual in his family home, a tormented teen begins to suspect that his affluent parents have an ugly secret.

0ceeea0b.title: Halston
0ceeea0b.description: His name built an empire. His style defined an era. American fashion designer Halston skyrockets to fame before his life starts to spin out of control.

55bb11f0.title: Special
55bb11f0.description: People have always seen him as different. But one big accident and one little lie are about to change everything.

9232a1ae.title: Mirage
9232a1ae.description: When a caring nurse alters the past to save a life, her present reality shifts to a new timeline — one without her beloved daughter.

41c2bd53.title: Long Shot
41c2bd53.description: When Juan Catalan is arrested for a murder he didn't commit, he builds his case for innocence around raw footage from a popular TV show. A documentary.

5500b0f0.title: Cam
5500b0f0.description: After a look-alike takes over her account, a cam girl with a growing fan base sets out to identify the mysterious culprit and reclaim her own identity.

7224c9fb.title: Explained
7224c9fb.description: With topical issues, bite-sized episodes and celebrity narrators, this documentary series from Vox delivers useful information with a fresh, fun spin.

dc3a07e6.title: A Classic Horror Story
dc3a07e6.description: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.

a7dc9d69.description: Coveting his intractable wife's land, he commits an unspeakable crime and inherits it all. Still, a price must be paid.

cff46227.title: The Toys That Made Us
cff46227.description: Star Wars. Barbie. G.I. Joe. Learn how your favorite toys came to life -- and conquered the world.
cff46227.chinese: 玩具的故事：你我的童年

4d77e988.title: The Paramedic
4d77e988.description: A freak accident. An unhinged mind. Nothing is off the table when it comes to keeping his beloved close. Really close.

c6a13459.title: The Lost Daughter
c6a13459.description: A professor in her 40s travels to a Greek isle to relax, read and occasionally flirt. But the arrival of a young mother sends her into an uneasy spiral.

4283527d.title: How to Become a Tyrant
4283527d.description: This 2021 political documentary series about despots is narrated by Peter Dinklage.

c62a9d01.title: Man in Love
c62a9d01.description: When he meets a debt-ridden woman who's caring for her ailing father, a debt collector with a heart of gold sets out to win her love.

37d16e4c.title: The Turning
37d16e4c.description: Ghosts, curses, possession and evil children. They didn't mention any of this in her job interview.

d242026d.title: Have a Good Trip: Adventures in Psychedelics
d242026d.description: Altered states. Bad decisions. Naughty acorns. Stars offer up a vivid dose of their best, worst and weirdest trips.

f7643e4c.title: Icarus
f7643e4c.description: In his Oscar-winning film, an American cyclist plunges into a vast doping scandal involving a Russian scientist -- Putin's most-wanted whistleblower.

56b040c5.title: A Sun
56b040c5.description: A grisly act. A broken family. A tragic loss. The past's unforgiving rays illuminate the road to redemption and acceptance.

90d946fe.title: Citrus
90d946fe.description: Rebellious Yuzu hopes to finally get a boyfriend, but instead she finds herself growing curiously attracted to her stern new stepsister.

31da0f91.title: Fear Street Part 2: 1978
31da0f91.description: Terrifying visions. Buried secrets. And so much blood. The mystery of Sarah Fier's curse deepens as a group of camp counselors try to stop a killer.

d6984e30.title: The Woman in the Window
d6984e30.description: Amy Adams leads an all-star cast including Julianne Moore, Anthony Mackie, Wyatt Russell and Gary Oldman in this immersive psychological thriller.

50225f5d.title: Interior Design Masters
50225f5d.description: Aspiring interior designers transform a variety of spaces from dowdy to delightful as they vie for a life-changing contract with a top London hotel.

6642da17.title: Dancing on Glass
6642da17.description: This 2022 psychological drama features María Pedraza and is directed by Jota Linares.

5590f1dc.title: Fear Street Part 3: 1666
5590f1dc.description: Dark secrets. Unspeakable evil. The merciless world of 1666 holds the truth behind the curse — and the key to Shadyside’s future.

bf8ae762.title: Surviving Death
bf8ae762.description: The Guardian hails this series as building “a convincing and provocative case that our consciousness can and does continue beyond life as we know it."

f00b3d0d.title: November 13: Attack on Paris
f00b3d0d.description: It began as a night of celebration -- and ended in devastation. An intimate look at a city's humanity, loss and resilience.

55e32161.title: Cadaver
55e32161.description: When a peculiar hotel dinner show draws crowds during a postapocalyptic famine, one family discovers they'll pay much more than the price of admission.

522225d7.title: More than Blue: The Series
522225d7.description: In this series based on the movie, a man with a terminal illness seeks to help his beloved find a long-term partner.
522225d7.chinese: 比悲傷更悲傷的故事：影集版

d404d1f0.title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
d404d1f0.description: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.

6520dc93.title: Hate the Sin, Love the Sinner
6520dc93.description: Love, loyalty and a life-altering decision. If they can't change the past, can they change the truth?

3ffa2f36.title: World's Most Wanted
3ffa2f36.description: Suspected of heinous crimes, they’ve avoided capture despite massive rewards and global investigations. A docuseries profiling the world’s most wanted.

ab34cc8a.title: Disenchantment
ab34cc8a.description: Lonely Zøg searches the forest for his true love, Ursula the Bear, who's got a secret. Elfo, Luci and Bean stumble upon the site of an ancient battle.

0f60e355.title: Gypsy
0f60e355.description: A therapist walks a tightrope between suburban life and her New York City practice when she entangles herself in the private affairs of her patients.

88f36731.title: Neymar: The Perfect Chaos
88f36731.description: From his childhood in Praia Grande to his playing days with Santos and the National Team, follow Neymar's journey from Brazil to international stardom.

e7a1e4f1.title: Eat Pray Love
e7a1e4f1.description: From Italy to India to Bali, one writer searches for meaning. But how far do you have to go to find yourself?

369bde32.title: Tear Along the Dotted Line
369bde32.description: A cartoonist in Rome with his armadillo-for-a-conscience reflects on his path in life and a would-be love as he and his friends travel outside the city.

4a0a9e38.title: Diagnosis
4a0a9e38.description: Unsolved medical mysteries. Global wisdom. New hope. When the whole world's reading, the right diagnosis can come from anyone and anywhere.

36c9deaa.title: On Children
36c9deaa.description: Hostage to test scores. Tyrannized by motherly attention. Their lives are no longer their own -- and they must measure up.
36c9deaa.chinese: 你的孩子不是你的孩子

39ef846d.title: The Politician
39ef846d.description: Ruthless rivals. Sordid scandals. Backstabbing and betrayal. High school is the perfect training for a life in politics.

9603b413.title: Cat People
9603b413.description: Cat people come in all shapes and sizes, but they share a love for their enchanting, unique feline friends. This docuseries reveals their tales.

c119b26d.title: The Boys in the Band
c119b26d.description: At a birthday party in 1968 New York, a surprise guest and a drunken game leave seven gay friends reckoning with unspoken feelings and buried truths.

470f0306.title: A Tale Dark & Grimm
470f0306.description: A bestselling book comes to life in this delightfully twisted tale that goes way beyond Hansel and Gretel and the witch with the candy-covered house.

7bb64b40.title: The Curse of La Llorona
7bb64b40.description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a troubled single mother discovers some folktales are true when a dark entity with sinister intentions pursues her children.

f9851e69.title: Heaven on the 4th Floor
f9851e69.description: At a massage parlor tucked away on the fourth floor of an apartment building, a Tuina practitioner brings clients both physical and emotional healing.

335e54ec.title: Abstract: The Art of Design
335e54ec.description: Step inside the minds of the most innovative designers in a variety of disciplines and learn how design impacts every aspect of life.

18713ede.title: Secrets of the Saqqara Tomb
18713ede.description: After unearthing a tomb that had been untouched for 4,400 years, Egyptian archaeologists attempt to decipher the history of the extraordinary find.

d34e4638.title: Pet Stars
d34e4638.description: Follow talent management company Pets on Q as they work with the biggest animal influencers on social media in this reality series.

b4b3f0d7.title: The World's Most Extraordinary Homes
b4b3f0d7.description: Award-winning architect Piers Taylor and actress/property enthusiast Caroline Quentin travel the world touring beautifully unconventional homes.
b4b3f0d7.chinese: 世上最超凡出眾的家園

afbd995b.title: Til Death Do Us Part
afbd995b.description: Bizarre time loops. Feline trouble. An unstoppable spot. Welcome to a twilit world of both dreams and nightmares.

5f332bee.title: Trolls
5f332bee.description: When their fellow Trolls are captured by hungry Bergens, upbeat Princess Poppy and her grouchy pal Branch embark on the adventure of a lifetime.

3b79756e.title: The Surgeon's Cut
3b79756e.description: They’re philosophers, storytellers and pioneers in their fields. Four surgeons reflect on their lives and professions in this inspiring docuseries.
3b79756e.chinese: 外科現場：手術刀下的技藝

ea881c1e.title: Be Alive Just Like You
ea881c1e.description: A man with paraplegia and a destitute young woman begin an unusual romance, desperately seeking connection amid the harsh realities of their lives.

eaa37a9a.title: Enola Holmes
eaa37a9a.description: Her mother? Vanished. Her brothers, Sherlock and Mycroft? Vexing. To solve this mystery, she'll go it alone. The game is afoot.

266b5297.title: I Lost My Body
266b5297.description: A young love blossoms. A lost hand embarks on a perilous journey. And a dreamlike adventure unfolds in the streets of Paris.

081b658b.title: Easy
081b658b.description: This eclectic, star-studded anthology follows diverse Chicagoans fumbling through the modern maze of love, sex, technology and culture.

a068a71e.title: Attack of the Hollywood Clichés!
a068a71e.description: One-man armies, meet-cutes, casual strolls away from huge explosions — stars and industry insiders toast and roast these cinematic chestnuts and more.

a313f410.title: Dear Tenant
a313f410.description: A man looking after his deceased partner's mother and son becomes entangled in a bitter legal battle with the child's uncle.

173ad191.title: Gaga: Five Foot Two
173ad191.description: She's an artist and icon who pours her heart into her work. An intimate look at her life, beyond the glitter and glam.

8d4bf3fc.title: Mystery Lab
8d4bf3fc.description: Host Felipe Castanhari explores science, history, mysteries and marvels, uncovering mind-blowing facts with help from his lab buddies.

cd4be42a.title: Amensalism
cd4be42a.description: A man who can foresee others' deaths teams up with a lawyer to seek answers to their murky, intertwined pasts and save lives.

c09b0d7c.title: The Mind, Explained
c09b0d7c.description: Ever wonder what's happening inside your head? From dreaming to anxiety disorders, discover how your brain works with this illuminating series.

34a08dc2.title: Buried by the Bernards
34a08dc2.description: Death isn't just a part of life — it's a business. And at R. Bernard Funeral Services, business is never boring.
34a08dc2.chinese: 伯納禮儀公司：實惠喪禮全包辦

f05d605a.title: The Social Dilemma
f05d605a.description: This social media exposé premiered at Sundance, winning a pair of Emmys with five additional nominations.

c59664a8.title: Gatao - The Last Stray
c59664a8.description: Romance unexpectedly blossoms when a freelance photographer arrives late to her assignment at a full moon celebration thrown for a mob boss's newborn.

4ff91153.title: The Forest of Love: Deep Cut
4ff91153.description: Nothing's as it seems when a charismatic conman and an aspiring film crew delve into the lives of two emotionally scarred women.
4ff91153.chinese: 在無愛之森放聲吶喊：深入密林

f355501f.title: Beyond Stranger Things
f355501f.description: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Shawn Levy and the Duffer Brothers sit down to discuss new characters and the season's most important themes.

6cb7dea6.title: Derren Brown: The Push
6cb7dea6.description: Mentalist Derren Brown engineers an audacious social experiment demonstrating how manipulation can lead an ordinary person to commit an appalling act.

0b381ad8.title: Made You Look: A True Story About Fake Art
0b381ad8.description: A woman walks into a New York gallery with a cache of unknown masterworks. Thus begins a story of art world greed, willfulness and a high-stakes con.
0b381ad8.chinese: 瞞天過海：紐約史上最大贗品案

32bef61b.title: Badla
32bef61b.description: When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired -- but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.

64869afe.title: Derren Brown: Sacrifice
64869afe.description: A master manipulator. A daring social experiment. How far can one man be pushed to save a stranger?

12bdf641.title: The Body
12bdf641.description: Mind games and mystery abound as a detective investigates the disappearance of a woman’s body from a morgue in this Hindi remake of a Spanish thriller.

3e0ee1bd.title: Animals on the Loose: A You vs. Wild Movie
3e0ee1bd.description: A lion running free. A baboon in need of rescue. Bear needs your help more than ever to be a hero — and get out alive — in this interactive adventure.
3e0ee1bd.chinese: 貝爾對戰荒野：停電危機

e08e8318.title: Minimalism: A Documentary About the Important Things
e08e8318.description: People dedicated to rejecting the American ideal that things bring happiness are interviewed in this documentary showing the virtues of less is more.
e08e8318.chinese: 極簡主義：記錄生命中的重要事物

7fac2d11.title: Holidate
7fac2d11.description: All they want is someone to drunk-mock strangers with on holidays. No pressure. No romance. No chance it'll lead to love.

7e4b5433.title: Derren Brown: Miracle
7e4b5433.description: Illusionist Derren Brown reinvents the concept of "faith healing” through a series of stunts that debunk the confines of fear, pain and disbelief.

4185d92e.title: Words Bubble Up Like Soda Pop
4185d92e.description: After meeting one bright, sunny day, a shy boy who expresses himself through haiku and a bubbly but self-conscious girl share a brief, magical summer.

01b8269c.title: Whose Vote Counts, Explained
01b8269c.description: All people are created equal, but what about all voters? The facts of this basic American right may not be as self-evident.

899f5e32.title: Ride or Die
899f5e32.description: She commits a terrible act for the woman she loves. Now it’s them against the world, and there’s no turning back.

3e8adca8.title: Coronavirus, Explained
3e8adca8.description: In 2020, the world changed. This topical series examines the coronavirus pandemic, the efforts to combat it and ways to manage its mental health toll.

74e6a779.title: Newness
74e6a779.description: A new couple tries to keep monogamy interesting. But the lure of online hookups could be too much to resist.

0f928801.title: Deep
0f928801.description: He's an ex-con trying to do right. But when his son gets taken from him, breaking the law is the least of his problems.

08883de8.title: Slasher
08883de8.description: Rampaging serial killers leave carnage in their wake as their next victims fight to stay alive in this horror anthology series.

6b6b556a.title: Is It Cake?
6b6b556a.description: These bakers are the real deal when it comes to serving up fakes, from handbags to hamburgers to luggage that looks amazing — and tastes even better.

08e6f7af.title: Conversations with a Killer: The John Wayne Gacy Tapes
08e6f7af.description: John Wayne Gacy becomes a prime suspect in teen Robert Piest’s disappearance. Previously unheard audio tapes reveal Gacy’s thoughts and early days.
08e6f7af.chinese: 與殺人魔對話：約翰·韋恩·葛西訪談錄

a0dabea2.title: The Movies That Made Us
a0dabea2.description: We laughed. We cried. We found ourselves at the movies, changed. Now go behind the scenes of these must-see pictures.
a0dabea2.chinese: 電影的故事：你我的永恆印象

24296ba8.title: Catching Killers
24296ba8.description: A terrifying Kansas serial killer reemerges after 30 years. Using DNA technology and help from the media, investigators race to prevent another murder.

d73fdca5.title: Sex Education
d73fdca5.description: Despite the ministrations of sex therapist mom Jean and encouragement from pal Eric, Otis worries that he can't get it on. He's not the only one.

1695352b.title: Adventure Beast
1695352b.description: This adult animated comedy series features and is executive produced by Bradley Trevor Greive.

481c574c.title: I AM A KILLER
481c574c.description: Death row inmates convicted of capital murder give firsthand accounts of their crimes in this documentary series.

e4b92928.title: Monsters Inside: The 24 Faces of Billy Milligan
e4b92928.description: True crime fans will find themselves engrossed in this dark and disturbing case, one of the first to invoke a multiple personality disorder defense.

1d8b8475.title: Bake Squad
1d8b8475.description: The bakers pack the fun and flair into an edible play space, a colossal chocolate dragon egg and other showstoppers for two boys’ joint birthday fest.

54743325.title: Worst Roommate Ever
54743325.description: A woman known as Dorothea Puente runs a boarding house for those less fortunate, but her seeming benevolence belies motives that are much darker.

81c09a80.title: 100 Humans
81c09a80.description: One hundred hardy souls from diverse backgrounds participate in playful experiments exploring age, sex, happiness and other aspects of being human.

f2e9b64e.title: PIECES OF HER
f2e9b64e.description: Andy's 30th birthday lunch is interrupted by a shocking act of violence. After her mom's stunning response goes viral, a threat emerges in their home.

247e10de.title: Baking Impossible
247e10de.description: For their final mission, the bakineers build tasty bridges that must survive multiple stress tests. The judges select the winning team.

73965e6e.title: The Innocent
73965e6e.description: At a club, Mat is dragged into a brawl and his life alters forever when he accidentally kills a man. Years later, happiness finally seems within reach.

6103e6ef.title: I missed you: Director's Cut
6103e6ef.description: A workaholic reconnects with two men she blocked on social media five years ago and begins to reflect on her past life choices.
6103e6ef.chinese: 我沒有談的那場戀愛：導演剪輯版

75709477.title: The Motive
75709477.description: In 1986, police discover a grisly crime scene: a family shot in their beds at point-blank range. The mystery deepens when a sole survivor appears.
75709477.chinese: 犯罪動機：以色列少年殺人事件

444a179b.title: School of Chocolate
444a179b.description: The chefs create edible illusions, including a planter box with earthy flavors, then form teams to bend chocolate into architectural shapes.

3e28ec17.title: The Staircase
3e28ec17.description: Following his wife's suspicious death, Michael Peterson speaks about his version of the events while lawyers and expert witnesses prepare for trial.

64058114.title: The Raincoat Killer: Chasing a Predator in Korea
64058114.description: Violent killings target wealthy victims around the city. Matching footprints found at each scene suggest a serial murderer on the loose.
64058114.chinese: 韓國雨衣殺手：全面追緝柳永哲

02bde40d.title: The Sons of Sam: A Descent into Darkness
02bde40d.description: In August 1977, the arrest of David Berkowitz ended New York City's wave of terror. But journalist Maury Terry believed there was more to the story.

e2060c4a.title: Lupin
e2060c4a.description: Years after a tragic injustice, Assane seeks to settle a score — and a debt — by stealing a diamond necklace, but the heist takes an unexpected turn.

df06d71c.title: John of God: The Crimes of a Spiritual Healer
df06d71c.description: Revered for his "miracles." Reviled for his crimes. One psychic had all the power — until brave survivors proved theirs.
df06d71c.chinese: 上帝的約翰：靈療師的罪行

6eaf4a1f.title: One of Us Is Lying
6eaf4a1f.description: School's in session as blogger Simon gets set to expose his classmates' deepest secrets. Then a death in detention turns up the heat on four students.

07dd3285.title: The Chestnut Man
07dd3285.description: Thulin and her reluctant new partner, Hess, investigate a gruesome murder. Politician Rosa Hartung returns to work after her daughter's disappearance.

75ae792a.title: Elize Matsunaga: Once Upon a Crime
75ae792a.description: On a temporary release from prison, Elize details her troubled relationship with Marcos as people close to the case describe the aftermath of the crime.

db2adb92.title: Don't F**k with Cats: Hunting an Internet Killer
db2adb92.description: A shocking online video brings together a widespread internet group of animal lovers out for justice. Their target, meanwhile, has more horrors planned.
db2adb92.chinese: 別惹喵皇：肉搜網際殺手

85507cbc.title: Murder Among the Mormons
85507cbc.description: Three lethal explosions rattle Salt Lake City in 1985 and expose a dark underbelly of religious-document dealing.

76e69768.title: Clickbait
76e69768.description: How well do you really know the person you love the most? And would you still love them if the world was saying that the version you knew was a lie?

8212853c.title: Crime Stories: India Detectives
8212853c.description: When a stabbing incident kills a mother and leaves her son gravely injured, Bengaluru police trace the steps and the motives of their unusual suspect.

a041fc51.title: House of Secrets: The Burari Deaths
a041fc51.description: News of 11 family members found dead in their home sparks a local and national frenzy. Perplexed investigators grapple with more questions than answers.
a041fc51.chinese: 邪密滿屋：印度家族集體死亡案

5d83994b.title: Dear Ex
5d83994b.description: A teen navigates a bitter feud between his willful mom and a free-spirited man, who's the lover and insurance beneficiary of his recently deceased dad.

dfd53db0.title: The Keepers
dfd53db0.description: Two former students launch a dogged investigation into the cold case of Sister Catherine Cesnik, a nun who was slain in Baltimore in 1969.

1b126a37.title: Unabomber - In His Own Words
1b126a37.description: As his infamy grows, Ted Kaczynski finds his footing as a serial bomber while authorities desperately search for a pattern with his earliest targets.

790ace0a.title: Spotless
790ace0a.description: When his estranged brother Martin resurfaces, crime scene cleaning company owner Jean is pulled into a dangerous world of mobsters and dark secrets.

90e41a63.title: Connected
90e41a63.description: Ever feel like you're being watched? Well, you may be right. Latif explores the sometimes cute, often creepy ways surveillance pervades our lives.

fb44c1ae.title: Safe
fb44c1ae.description: When his teenage daughter doesn't return home after a party, Tom Delaney anxiously combs the neighborhood and learns her boyfriend is also missing.

ceda07a9.title: Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayal & Greed
ceda07a9.description: Bob Ross brought joy to millions as the world’s most famous art instructor. But a battle for his business empire cast a shadow over his happy trees.
ceda07a9.chinese: 鮑伯·羅斯：繪畫的美好，背叛與貪婪

d04266d1.title: The Prom
d04266d1.description: They canceled prom just to keep her out. But now the dance is getting a big Broadway makeover — and everyone's invited.

26df115a.title: Hypnotic
26df115a.description: Concentrate on the light. Feel the weight of your body. Relinquish control. And let the deadly mind games begin.

0467779e.title: Inside the Criminal Mind
0467779e.description: Criminal profilers and neurological experts weigh in on what drives serial killers and whether certain people are predisposed to murder.

470c7a89.title: The Butterfly Effect
470c7a89.description: A haunted youth learns how to change his terrible past. But the truth he finds might not be what he wants.

423898ca.title: Paprika
423898ca.description: Reality and the dream world are on a collision course after a device that can record dreams is stolen from a psychiatric research facility.

b43af7bb.title: Criminal: Spain
b43af7bb.description: When detectives interrogate Isabel, she talks about love, sex and her Dalmatian, forcing Chief Inspector María to take a risk to try and solve a murder.

319232a9.title: Someone Has to Die
319232a9.description: In conservative 1950s Spain, the alleged relationship between a young man and a Mexican ballerino creates an uproar of harrowing consequences.

63ea4486.title: Unbelievable
63ea4486.description: As a traumatized young woman reports being raped by an intruder, she faces a whirlwind of emotions -- and increasingly skeptical questions from police.

b2fd236d.title: Trial By Media
b2fd236d.description: A man reveals his crush to a straight friend on "The Jenny Jones Show." Days later a murder occurs, leading to questions about the show's culpability.
